website_summaries.verdict: Despite its affordable price, this pure brass ride doesn't sacrifice on quality. Perfect for beginners.
pros: The large-peen hammering and pinpoint lathing gives you a fast decay
Made from a special formula of brass that's inexpensive but durable and produces a great full sound
cons: Some users say the sound's not good enough for recording

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality cymbal for beginning drummers and pros alike!
customer_reviews.text: This ride cymbal is an incredible value for the price. The cymbal has a warm rich tone and is made of high quality brass. I started my musical journey in 1965 as a pop/rock drummer until the late 60's. Over the years I've learned to play guitars, keyboards and bass as well but this year, 47 years later I've decided to resume playing drums again. This cymbal I purchased from Amazon is one of the best I've ever played.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Chris

customer_reviews.title: but it's a fantastic workaround for when we loan the drum kit to ...
customer_reviews.text: When you need a cheap cymbal for a rehearsal scenario, it does the trick. Not something we would ever record with or use in a live situation, but it's a fantastic workaround for when we loan the drum kit to other bands or when we don't want to bring all the nice cymbals to rehearsal.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Soungs fantastic! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go with a drum set. I needed a 20 inch. I was extremely pleased with the sound! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I made a video that shows you the different sounds of the Sabian SBR Series 20-Inch Ride and the Zildjian ZBT 14 i-Inch Crash Cymbal. Both sound great for the price, but in my opinion the Sabian SBR Ride is a better quality cymbal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D

customer_reviews.title: A Good Deal For a Practice Kit Cymbal
customer_reviews.text: The highest point of this product by far is the price. I have yet to find a cheaper 20" ride cymbal, at least not one that I could use. This one is certainly usable, and has put up with months of daily abuse with no sign of cracks or dents. It has a very bright sound, one that is not exactly studio quality, but for practice or even small gigs, it's alright. Anyone who's putting together a kit, is short on money, and isn't looking for pro equipment should consider this item.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very good Cymbal. I like larger ride cymbals so this was a great size. The price was good for SBR/budget cymbals. Sounds really nice and has a really good sounding bell.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: General use
customer_reviews.text: This is great for something between a crash and a ride. Purchase this as an addition to a first drum set because the symbols that came with it or almost useless. This one has a great Ring and Falls somewhere between a crash and a ride compared to what he's used to playing at the school.
customer_reviews.author: W Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for less money
customer_reviews.text: I love Sabian cymbals in this range as they are tough, cheap and sound really nice. Can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Techtesting

customer_reviews.title: Best budget ride you can get
customer_reviews.text: Best budget ride you can get. If you need a ride to replace your starter kit ride or just want a cheap ride, it's pretty decent!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Friedly

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i originally bought a snare just to fool around with. then i bought hi-hat, another snare and when i looked for a ride/crash cymbal i saw this. decent price and put me another step closer to complete my drum set. next step the bass drum!
customer_reviews.author: Denis J.

customer_reviews.title: I do not know if it was like this from the origin or was in the establishment ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm from Ecuador, I ordered this "RIDE" and it came with a blow, I do not know if it was like this from the origin or was in the establishment of courier. but it sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value🤙🏻
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with his new ride cymbol.. beautiful sound,great price,fast shipping.. very content with our purchase.🤙🏻
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: this is an excellent cymbal for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son (13 yr) is a beginner Jazz drummer and we purchased this to add to the set we bought here on Amazon: Link:  I also purchased this stand to go with it: Link:  We didn't want to make a huge investment, and as others have said, this is an excellent cymbal for the money. In case he ever decides to upgrade, I checked with my local music store to see if there would be any resale value. And they said that Cymbals like these sell like crazy. Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great ride cymbal!
customer_reviews.text: This is my current ride cymbal on my set, and I'm pleased with it. Fast shipping, and a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Monk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big beautiful ride cymbal. Nice crisp sound. For the price, you can't beat it.Very heavy, use a good stand.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Dick

customer_reviews.title: Nice brass and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Nicely crafted and have a good sound. Goes great with my acoustical set.
customer_reviews.author: C J Daubenspeck

customer_reviews.title: This ride is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cymbal. It's really flashy and has a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie W.

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with my son for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My son who is learning the drums asked for this as a special gift for Xmas - and was overjoyed when he set it up and added it to his set. Said the sound is clear and clean - just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Ted in CT

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds fantastic. Couldn't ask for a better ride cymbal at this price. I use it on my cheap garage set, and it sounds better than my gigging set, I think.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good cymbals for the price. Great for beginner/intermediate drummers.
customer_reviews.author: T. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great pick up. Has held up and lasted extremely well (I generally beat the hell out of cymbals), well priced for a beginner drummer like me and sounds really good.
customer_reviews.author: Saltie06

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tone... was really surprised lol! i would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Fun times

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. Excellent quality. Sound professional grade. Nice finish. One of the best ride symbols.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good cymbal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My first impression of this cymbal was "junk." After giving a chance, I decided that I liked it much better the more I played on it. It has a really good ride sound and is truly a good cymbal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RodHall

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice! :D
customer_reviews.text: The cymbal came through mail quickly, and I fell in love with it even quicker! It sounds great, and I'm very satisfied! I would recommend this cymbal for anyone looking, not a real wallet buster, and high quality! (:
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners...
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bringer this is great but no after you start.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Sabian 20 inch SBR Ride
customer_reviews.text: It just Sounds Professional, I did no expect it to sound the way it does, very crisp and clear, I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: -1 for the bell, despite the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good cymbal for the price. I just wish the bell sounded better. Considering the low price might be worth of five stars but I can't stress enough that the bell doesn't sound good to me. Should be fine for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cymbal for the price and for being brass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cymbal for the price and for being brass. A little too washy, but nothing that can't be fixed with a moon gel.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbal for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: could not believe the quality of this cymbal when it arrived!! The price was right on (cheapest I could find) but the quality was top rated!! Made my son's drum set complete!! SUPER FAST SHIPPING TOO!!
customer_reviews.author: amy wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it might be to thin but it wasen't. Nice bell on it. When i get into the wash theres a great tone. good value
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG E KNIFLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbal
customer_reviews.text: Great ride cymbal has a nice tone and its relatively cheap so it a win win for me and a great choice
customer_reviews.author: JCR14

customer_reviews.title: Great Cymbal
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Great sound at a great price couldnt ask for anything better!!!
customer_reviews.author: German Montijo

customer_reviews.title: I love it It is also big
customer_reviews.text: This is a ride cymbal. I love it It is also big! It has a crisp sound and works well with my playing
customer_reviews.author: BigT

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Best price you will ever find on a ride cymbal. Sabian is the best brand ever. I personally think this is one of the best ride cymbals ever. Only $70!! You may think this is a lower class cheap cymbal, but it is not!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Mclatcher

customer_reviews.title: So good they make your other drums sound awful by comparison.
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable, I'm just a beginner so I can't speak from experience, but this ride made the rest of my crappy drums sound even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Olivera

customer_reviews.title: very sad.
customer_reviews.text: cymbal was poorly, and unprofessionally packed, and came damaged. very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sabian 20" SBr Ride Cymbal (SBR2012)
product_meta.description: Strong, clean stick definition and a bright bell add up to versatility.
feature_bullets: Smartly priced, SBr Brass is in a class of its own
SBr makes your first step into cymbals an easy one
